app.controller

Class ReferenceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.controller.ReferenceController

  • @Controller
public class ReferenceController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all requests related to Reference -classes

      • getFromAcm

        @RequestMapping(value="/acm",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String getFromAcm(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                              @RequestParam
                                                                                              java.lang.String url,
                                                                                              org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttrs)
                                                                                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method adds a reference from ACM to the database
        Parameters:
        model - Model object
        url - String url of a reference from ACM
        redirectAttrs - RedirectAttributes
        Returns:
        path redirect
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

      • addInproceedings

        @RequestMapping(value="/inproceedings",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addInproceedings(@ModelAttribute
                                                                                                              Inproceedings inp,
                                                                                                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingresult,
                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttrs)
        This method handles post-request to path /inproceedings and takes Inproceedings type parameter. It uses @ModelAttribute annotation to render th:field tags from view
        Parameters:
        inp - Inproceedings object
        bindingresult - BindingResult
        redirectAttrs - RedirectAttributes
        Returns:
        either path inproceedings or redirect to the home page if no errors

                method=GET)
public java.lang.String searchReference(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                                     java.lang.String search)
        This method takes search -String to compare it on all references toString -methods and return all references including the String
        Parameters:
        model - Model object
        search - - field for any string to search from references
        Returns:
        path home
